excuses.text: I can't come, my cat just started therapy.
I'm currently in a staring contest with my ceiling fan.
My plants are emotionally dependent on me today.
I got trapped under my blanket and it's a trust issue now.
Mercury is in reverse gear again.
I can't go out ‚Äî my WiFi needs me.
My stomach is full of regret and biryani.
I'm currently negotiating with my bed about getting up.
My phone battery is at 1% and I'm emotionally attached to it.
I'm in the middle of a very important conversation with my reflection.
My Netflix account is having separation anxiety.
I'm currently being held hostage by my couch.
My brain is currently updating to version 2.0.
I'm in a committed relationship with my pajamas right now.
My motivation is currently on vacation in Bali.
My laptop is having an existential crisis.
I'm currently debugging my life choices.
My coffee hasn't kicked in yet, and neither have I.
I'm in a meeting with my inner procrastinator.

I'm experiencing technical difficulties with my motivation.
My brain is currently in airplane mode.
I'm currently rebooting my work ethic.
My gym clothes are still in the dryer from last week.

I'm currently doing mental reps.
